summary: Create a website for VS Studio Photography (owner Vikky Kumar) to promote services and enable bookings.

existing_features.title: Create a responsive multi-page marketing website for “VS Studio Photography” that prominently displays the business name, owner name (Vikky Kumar), contact phone (7070945104), email (vscomputer7070@gmail.com), and address (Etwarpur Nizamat Chowk, Lalganj, Vaishali, Bihar 844121).
Add core website sections/pages suitable for a photography studio: Home (hero + call-to-action), Services, Gallery, and Contact/Book Now, with navigation between them.

Implement a “Book Now” / booking inquiry form that collects at minimum: name, phone, optional email, event type, preferred date, message/notes; validate required fields client-side and show a clear success/failure status after submission.
Apply a coherent, distinctive visual theme (colors, typography, spacing, and component styling) appropriate for a photography studio, and use it consistently across all pages.
Add basic SEO and sharing metadata (document title, description) for the VS Studio Photography website.
Add generated static image assets to support the initial site look (logo and hero/banner plus gallery placeholders) and render them directly from the frontend public assets (not via backend).

Add an Admin page that lists all stored booking inquiries from the backend and renders them in an easy-to-scan table/list (at minimum: name, phone, event type, preferred date, submitted timestamp, and the booking id).

Expose navigation to the Admin page from the existing UI (e.g., add an 'Admin' entry in the header navigation or an 'Admin' link in the footer) and ensure navigation scrolls to the top consistently with existing navigation behavior.
Add basic booking management actions on the Admin page: allow deleting a booking inquiry and refreshing the list after deletion.
Ensure the backend booking list is presented in a useful order on the Admin page (newest first) without breaking existing booking submission behavior.

new_feature_requests.summary: Build a website for VS Studio Photography to showcase services and enable booking/contact.
Create backend storage and APIs in the single Motoko actor to persist booking inquiries submitted from the website and to retrieve them (for future admin use).
Add an admin page/dashboard to view stored booking inquiries submitted via the Book Now form (read/retrieve entries).
